product_name: Mizuno Wave Inspire 10 Road-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: The Mizuno Wave Inspire 10 Road-Running Shoes have a magical blend of support and cushioning that is loved by dedicated runners with moderate overpronation. Breathable mesh uppers with synthetic leather overlays keep feet cool. SmoothRide engineering promotes natural movement from the back of your foot to the front, initiating a smooth, rocking motion throughout your stride. U4ic midsole material provides resilient cushioning, and it's 30% lighter than the AP+ midsole found in other Mizuno shoes. Mizuno Wave(R) midsole technology disperses impact uniformly over length/width of midsole, providing unrivaled cushioning. Dynamotion Fit(TM) features uppers that mirror the motion of your feet so that you can run your best without any bunching, pulling or sliding. The men's Mizuno Wave Inspire 10 Road-Running Shoes have rubber outsoles with deep flex grooves that deliver cushioning, flexibility and long wear in high-impact areas.
short_description: The Mizuno Wave Inspire 10 Road-Running Shoes have a magical blend of support and cushioning that is loved by dedicated runners with moderate overpronation.
